Uses of Package
com.netflix.servo.annotations

Packages that use com.netflix.servo.annotations
com.netflix.servo Primary interfaces for metrics. 
com.netflix.servo.annotations Annotations to easily expose metrics from a class. 
com.netflix.servo.aws Code related to Amazon Web Services (AWS). 
com.netflix.servo.examples Examples of how to use servo. 
com.netflix.servo.jmx Monitor registry and helper classes to expose monitored attributes to JMX. 
 

Classes in com.netflix.servo.annotations used by com.netflix.servo
AnnotatedObject
          Wrapper around an object that is annotated to make it easy to access the annotated fields.
 

Classes in com.netflix.servo.annotations used by com.netflix.servo.annotations
AnnotatedAttribute
          Wrapper around an AccessibleObject that is annotated with Monitor.
DataSourceType
          Indicates the type of value that is annotated to determine how it will be measured.
Monitor
          Annotation indicating a field or method should be collected for monitoring.
 

Classes in com.netflix.servo.annotations used by com.netflix.servo.aws
DataSourceType
          Indicates the type of value that is annotated to determine how it will be measured.
 

Classes in com.netflix.servo.annotations used by com.netflix.servo.examples
Monitor
          Annotation indicating a field or method should be collected for monitoring.
MonitorTags
          Tags to associate with all metrics in an instance.
 

Classes in com.netflix.servo.annotations used by com.netflix.servo.jmx
AnnotatedAttribute
          Wrapper around an AccessibleObject that is annotated with Monitor.
AnnotatedObject
          Wrapper around an object that is annotated to make it easy to access the annotated fields.
Monitor
          Annotation indicating a field or method should be collected for monitoring.
